text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking good with 3 ft @ 11s WNW swell and light E winds at 11 mph. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, especially during the mid-day push. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @ 9s with fresh E winds at 17 mph, still workable at sheltered spots. Day after, similar conditions with 2 ft @ 7s, but only Dunaverty shows some potential. Best: today.
